A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I am very disappointed with this movie.  Luke's character is completely castrated and turned into something else.  The guy who would not accept that Darth Vader was evil is the same one who decided his nephew\, the son of his sister and best friend\, deserved to die because he was heading in a bad direction.  There is no elaboration on why Rey has this understanding of the force that makes her a savant that can best one of the most well trained jedi's ever...and only with a few days training.  Not much done with Fin.  Plenty of SJW and 'oh\, what about the animals' sub-plots.  There's a reason I don't watch the 2 minute commercials that just show sad animals and sad music.   I hate being pandered to\, and at the end of the day\, that is all this movie did for me.  The Tomatometer is a lie!
